thread.title: Watch Meryl Streep Receive a Standing Ovation For Her "Overrated" Career at the Oscars
thread.title_full: Watch Meryl Streep Receive a Standing Ovation For Her "Overrated" Career at the Oscars

author: Erin Cullum
title: Watch Meryl Streep Receive a Standing Ovation For Her "Overrated" Career at the Oscars
text:
Meryl Streep Standing Ovation at the Oscars 2017 Watch Meryl Streep Receive a Standing Ovation For Her "Overrated" Career at the Oscars February 26, 2017 
via GIPHY 
Jimmy Kimmel took a moment during his Oscars opening monologue to recognize Meryl Streep for her "overrated" acting career, and naturally the crowd responded with a standing ovation. Referring to Donald Trump's tweets about Meryl's Golden Globes Speech in January, Kimmel joked, "One actress has stood the test of time for her many uninspiring and overrated performances." To prove just how talented and inspirational the actress really is, the late night host asked the crowd to take a minute to applaud Meryl, and the crowd's reaction speaks for itself â€” she received a standing ovation. Arguably the largest standing ovation in the history of standing ovations, right Trump?
